amendment.description: Amendment sought to strike the $350 million in funding for the Legal Services Corporation and to apply the savings to the spending reduction account.
amendment.purpose: An amendment to reduce funding for payments to the Legal Services Corporation by $350,000,000 and apply the savings to the spending reduction account.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Scott, Austin amendment (A047) Failed by recorded vote: 116 - 290 (Roll no. 253).

action.text: Amendment (A047) offered by Mr. Scott, Austin.
Amendment failed in Committee of the Whole
